title: South Korea : e-commerce sales volume 2009 to 2018
yAxis: E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won
summary: In general E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won has rose over the Year.
E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won, about 91.99 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won about 20.64 was reached at Year 2009
